description: Do Not Modify. Generated by Event Schema Generator v1.0.15 on 2020-Jun-15 08:03:33

deviceFwVer.description: Units: Firmware Version as an array of integers. The firmware version of the primary processor within the telemetry device. Firmware Version is formatted as 5 two byte integers specified as Application, Major, Minor, Revision, Build Number.

deviceFwCrc.description: Units: CRC32. A CRC32 of the firmware image currently running in the primary (main) processor within the telemetry device. CRC32 is formatted as a unsigned 32bit integer.

deviceFwSize.description: Units: Byte Length. Byte length of the firmware image currently running in the primary (main) processor within the telemetry device.

deviceFwVer_Io.description: Units: Firmware Version as an array of integers. The firmware version of the secondary (IO) processor within the telemetry device. Firmware Version is formatted as 5 two byte integers specified as Application, Major, Minor, Revision, Build Number.

deviceFwCrc_Io.description: Units: CRC32. A CRC32 of the firmware image currently running in the secondary processor within the telemetry device. CRC32 is formatted as a unsigned 32bit integer.

deviceFwSize_Io.description: Units: Byte Length. Byte length of the firmware image currently running in the secondary (IO) processor within the telemetry device.

deviceFwVer_IoBoot.description: Units: Firmware Version as an array of integers. The firmware version of the bootloader of the secondary processor within the telemetry device. Firmware Version is formatted as 5 two byte integers specified as Application, Major, Minor, Revision, Build Number.

displayFwVer.description: Units: Firmware Version as an array of integers. The firmware version of the User Interface Telemetry Display, directly linked to the telemetry device. Firmware Version is formatted as 4 single byte integers specified as Application, Major, Minor, Revision Number.
